pages.title: Fence
pages.text: A $(l)fence$() is a barrier block that cannot normally be jumped over, similar to a $(l:building/types/wall)wall$(). Unlike a wall, a player (but not mobs) can see through the openings in a fence.

pages.title: Fence Gate
pages.text: A $(l)fence gate$() is a block that shares the functions of both the $(building/types/door)door$() and the fence.
